summary: 🐺 Arya Stark appreciation 32/- “We had to throw rocks," she said miserably. "I told her to run, to go be free, that I didn't...
caption:
🐺 Arya Stark appreciation 32/-

“We had to throw rocks,“ she said miserably. "I told her to run, to go be free, that I didn’t want her anymore. There were other wolves for her to play with, we heard them howling, and Jory said the woods were full of game, so she’d have deer to hunt. Only she kept following and finally we had to throw rocks. I hit her twice. She whined and looked at me and I felt so ‘shamed, but it was right, wasn’t it? The queen would have killed her.”

summary: ~This Is Gonna Be Me~
title: ~This Is Gonna Be Me~
body:
So has anyone else seen that featured post or ad….Thing?

It’s the one talking about George R.R Martin, His wife, and Arya Stark.

If you haven’t it says that his wife told him she would divorce him if he killed Arya.

This is gonna be me you non-gender specific pronouns!

summary: Who is more likely to eventually encounter Jeyle Poole first (should Jeyne live long enough to be encountered) - Sansa or Arya?
question: Who is more likely to eventually encounter Jeyle Poole first (should Jeyne live long enough to be encountered) - Sansa or Arya?
answer:
Oh, Arya, no question in my mind. Per “Theon I” TWOW, this was the last we heard about Jeyne Poole:

“Oh, and take the Stark girl with you. Deliver her to Lord Commander Snow on your way to Eastwatch.” Stannis tapped the parchment that lay before him. “A true king pays his debts.”

But, of course, what neither Stannis nor Justin Massey knew in that moment (since chronologically it hadn’t happened yet) is that Jon Snow was assassinated by Bowen Marsh and his fellow co-conspirators, and while he seems all but certain to come back to life in TWOW, for the moment there is no Lord Commander Snow to whom Ser Justin can deliver Jeyne. Justin might have been prepared by Stannis to hear rumors (maybe even true) that his king had fallen in battle against the Boltons, but certainly he would not expect to hear that the Lord Commander of the Night’s Watch was dead as well. Unless he is completely stupid, I think Justin Massey is going to hear about Jon being killed, decide that Castle Black is no place for the woman he believes to be Arya Stark, and take her (and Alysane Mormont!) to Eastwatch directly, and thence to Braavos.

And that, I think, is where Arya will come in. Much of her FeastDance arc has been questioning whether she can truly become “no one”, and emphasizing that Arya cannot let go of her own identity, not entirely. Even into TWOW, Arya is still caught between her training as a Faceless Man and her personal feelings and goals as Arya Stark - and as her killing of Raff showed, Arya is still not willing to completely subsume her motivations into the philosophy of the House of Black and White. The farther she goes in her training, the more difficult those two paths are going to be to reconcile (not to mention the possible punishment-training the Faceless Men will impose on her for killing again out of the line of duty, so to speak).

The arrival of Jeyne Poole with Justin Massey will be, then, the most explicit, obvious challenge to Arya’s Faceless Men journey of de-identification. Here will be someone not merely that she vaguely recognizes (like Dareon and Sam, whom she knew for Night’s Watchmen), nor someone that she knows personally but is otherwise unremarkable as an individual (like Raff), but someone that she knows personally who is believed to be Arya Stark herself. If she does nothing to intervene with Justin’s party, Arya will have made a firm decision that she wishes to let go of her former life, to give up being Arya Stark … but of course she can’t. She knows Jeyne too well, is indeed among the few people who could positively identify “Lady Arya” as the steward of Winterfell’s daughter (and, just as importantly, Jeyne is also uniquely capable of identifying Arya as the real Arya Stark). Confronted with the possibility of losing more of herself (physically and psychologically) to the Faceless Men, given the opportunity to once and for all assert herself as Arya Stark and return home, I think Arya will do just that, finally letting poor Jeyne be Jeyne Poole again and publicly reclaiming her Stark identity. 

That’s not to say Sansa will never see her old friend again, of course. I’m very much convinced that part of Sansa’s turn against Littlefinger will be finding out both that Baelish was behind her father’s fall (and death) and that he sold her closest childhood companion into sexual slavery and eventually had her pretend to be her own sister to marry a monster. I wouldn’t be surprised if she, Jeyne, and Arya all ended up in ADOS in Winterfell, home after long and often brutal journeys away for all three.

blog.name: i-crossed-the-narrow-sea
blog.title: Valar Morghulis
blog.description: I'm here mostly for Arya x Jaqen or Jaqarya, if you prefer, amazing fanfiction authors whose stories help me to deal with the damage the showmakers did to Arya and Jaqen storyline, especially Braavos part. Obsessed with Jaqen H'ghar and Arya Stark and the House of Black and White ;) I love Braavos above all and I hope Arya and Jaqen story will be much better in the next book than what we've got so far in the show. I also love Tyrion  Lannister (really hope he'll get better lines next season), Jon Snow and ser Bronn of the Blackwater. I ship Arya and Jaqen, Tyrion and Tysha (I believe there is hope for them in the book) , Jaime and Brienne, Sansa and Sandor though I also like the idea of Sansa reuniting with Tyrion. I believe Rhaegar Targaryen never raped  Lyanna Stark but saved her from awful Robert Baratheon.

tags: the house of black and white
a song of ice and fire
summary: @buttercuparry In Braavos she too was beaten or slapped till she bled, groped and faced sexual harassment from a pervert, told...
body:
@buttercuparry

In Braavos she too was beaten or slapped till she bled, groped and faced sexual harassment from a pervert, told that she must not be Arya Stark anymore, told to give up her ties to her old life, her very characteristic, her empathy and taught to kill literally anyone, may it be someone innocent or guilty without feeling any remorse or without feeling any need to listen to her moral compass bc of the belief of the HoBaW.

I read the whole discussion and since I can’t leave the question in your ask box I’m asking here. I usually ignore all the nonsensical biased rants on tumblr but I’m curious about this post you’ve made.  

Could you provide me with the quote when Arya was beaten until she was bleeding in the House of Black and White ? Beaten, not slapped since you compared it to her Harrenhal days. Could you provide me with the exact quote when she was sexually harassed by the Faceless Men ? Or are you talking about Arya seducing Raff on her own will ? Could you provide me with the quote when she was forced to kill an innocent person in Braavos ? Or are you talking about Dareon she killed on her own will ? Could you provide me with the quote when any of the Faceless Man kills an innocent person in the books ?

Could you provide me with the quote when Arya hates the Kindly Man like she hated Wease in Harrenhal ? Or when she’s afraid of beating, starving, getting raped by the Faceless Men ?  Could you provide me with the quote when she is forced by the Kindly Man to stay in the House of Black and White and become No One ? Or are you referring to the choice she made after they fed her, offered her shelter and a way out of the House of Black and White ? Marriage and becoming a courtesan weren’t her only options as @needlestark quoted. They offered her a place at the house of the merchant where she could live a normal life like she did at Brusco’s house. They wanted to give her anything to keep her out of the House of Black and White.

I’m asking politely about the exact quotes from the books. I must have read a different version of  A Song of Ice and Fire and I’m willing to learn about yours.

tags: source : justin and the knights of valour
summary:
Arya Stark : Just seeing you made them run away.
Jaqen H'ghar : I know. I have that effect on people.
body:
Arya Stark : Just seeing you made them run away.
Jaqen H'ghar : I know. I have that effect on people.

dialogue.label: Arya Stark :
dialogue.phrase: Just seeing you made them run away.

dialogue.name: Jaqen H'ghar
dialogue.label: Jaqen H'ghar :
dialogue.phrase: I know. I have that effect on people.

summary: i am having too much fun writing Arya Stark as a skyrim npc interacting with the dragonborn. like, i just put in a thing about a...
body:
i am having too much fun writing Arya Stark as a skyrim npc interacting with the dragonborn. like, i just put in a thing about a wing in the blue palace being haunted???????? sike, let’s activate ‘The Mind of Madness’ why don’t we!

also, lydia is so much fun to write, especially when i get to legitimately use her dialogue as cold-opens to the dragonborn’s ridiculousness.

edit: here’s a link to the fic itself

blog.name: aqueenofmarble
blog.title: Do I Dare Disturb the Universe?

summary:
You have blood on your hands
A deep crimson red
Whether it‘s death or despair
It was survival only
I am a monster, you say
You...
body:
You have blood on your hands

A deep crimson red

Whether it‘s death or despair

It was survival only

I am a monster, you say

You scream it out of your lungs

And expect me

To turn away from you

But I saw everything

I was there

The person you are to survive

Is not who you are

You say my hands have only

Drops of blood

But yours are a painted red

They‘ve been in oceans of blood

Why don‘t you understand?

I see through your pretense

You try to push me away

Because you‘re afraid

Just try and see

You are just as me

A survivor, a damaged soul

Who hopes to be safe and whole

Let me catch you when you fall

Or let me be your wings

Let me hold you in the darkest night

When your past comes to haunt you

Look in my eyes and you‘ll see

We are just the same, we still are

You, with your sad grey eyes

Me, with my angry blue ones

Finally, we‘ve found what we looked for

In the same eyes, in the same soul

We still are kindred spirits

Aiming for the same stars

Our hearts still beating

As one.


(I wrote this poem and realised at some point I was basically describing Gendrya lol)

blog.name: incorrect-got-quotes
blog.title: Dead, almost like my interest in the show
blog.description: I post quotes when I feel like it. Mostly nowadays I don’t.If you want to use one of the quotes as a story or drawing prompt, I'm fine with that, as long as you credit me in your story or art. Also, tag any drawings under #oberyn’s saucy art. Yes, I am in fact Oberyn Martell. For those on mobile, here is my ship list: https://incorrect-got-quotes.tumblr.com/list-of-ships Main: garnetislovegarnetislife. SUBMISSION BOX IS (MOST LIKELY) PERMANENTLY CLOSED!
